content.p: We are an independant, open listening ear for students and staff of any faith or none. Drop into the chaplaincy for a chat and free tea and coffee. Our Oasis space, in Portland Building is open Monday - Friday 10am-5pm and provides a safe, quiet space for students and staff to use. We offer one-to-one pastoral appointments where you can talk to a chaplain about anything you want, whether it's a faith-related, personal or academic issue. If you have experienced a recent or past bereavement and would like to talk to someone about it please do get in touch, we offer both group support and one-to-one support: A29, Portland Building University of Nottingham University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Tel: +44 (0)115 951 3931 Email: chaplains@nottingham.ac.uk
